body.name: NWANA 250W Cordless Vacuum Cleaner,Powerful Suction 26Kpa Lightweight Stick Vacuum, 6 * 2200 mAh Battery, 45 Mins Runtime, Rechargeable Stick Vac Broom for Home Hard Floor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 24 mins
features: 【250W Brushless Motor & 26Kpa Powerful Suction】Cordless stick vacuum cleaners for home features a 250W state-of-the-art brushless motor, generating 26Kpa strong suction. Easily sucks dirt, debris, dust, pet hair, cat litter, pet food, and other messes with ease. This cordless vacuum cleaner performs perfectly on hardwood floors, low and middle pile carpets, tile, marble, etc.

【2 Adjustment & 45 Mins Long Battery Life】 cordless vacuum cleaner V10 equipped with 250 upgraded brushless motor, generating 26Kpa strong suction.Eco (13Kpa for 45 mins), Strong (26Kpa for 20 mins),It can effectively deep clean dirt, debris, dust, pet hair, cat litter and other messes from hard floor and low pile carpet. Brushless cordless vacuum are long-life and more energy efficient, compared with regular brushed stick vacuum.

【LED Display & LED Rotatable Brush Head】LED display design of this stick vacuum cleaner makes you effortlessly know the status of the hardwood floor vacuum. It shows the battery level, suction power mode, and automatic dust detection. 4 bright LED lights help the stick vacuum cordless illuminate every dark area and track dust and dirt. The brush head can be rotated by 90°/180°, with no dead end in corners and under furniture. Bring ease and convenience to your cleaning work!

【6-Layer Filtration System】This vacuum cleaner carpet and floor features a 6-stage fully-sealed filtration system . It captures 99.99% of ultra-fine dust and locks in small particles without leakage, expelling fresher, cleaner air for your family. Service life is twice than traditional filtration system. Note: The HEPA filter is not washable, so be sure to clean and replace it regularly for optimal filtration efficiency.

【Versatile Cleaning & Easy to Use】The NWANA V10 cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with a 2-in-1 brush, long crevice, and extensible metal tube, making you clean stairs, curtains, windowsills, sofas, beds, desks, cars, RVs, and other hard-to-reach places with ease. The lightweight design and ergonomic handle make operating the handheld vacuum cordless effortless with one hand. The "One-Button Dust Dumping" design makes emptying simple and efficient.

【Tangle-Free Floor Brush & Excellent Customer Service】NWANA rechargeable vacuum cordless comes with one improved V-shaped floor brush that prevents hair from getting tangled on the roller. Spend less time cleaning the rollers! The soft roller protects your hard floor. If you have any questions, our 7*24 hours online customer service team is always ready to provide you with a 100% satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good auction power, lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This vacuum has been perfect for cleaning all of the different floor surfaces in my house. It has good suction power and I is corded so I never have to worry about running out of battery life. It is very versatile, it can be used as a handheld vacuum so I am able to use it on other or materials such as my furniture and curtains. I have found the handheld to be even more helpful on our hardwood steps where dog hair seems to always collect. The small nozzle attachment is perfect for the creases and corners of each step. There are several attachments to meet different needs. This vacuum gets the job done efficiently the first time around. The vacuum is also lightweight which cuts down on strain on my back. Although lightweight it is durable and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I didn't need an expensive, fancy vacuum because I didn't have many carpeted rooms. This one is easy to use, works well, and is available in three different colors. It's not only for the floor, though.Not only is it ideal for carpets, but it also works great for cleaning hardwood floors and tiles. With its strong suction, it may even be used as a handheld vacuum for cleaning carpets, furniture, drapes, and other surfaces.Several attachments are included to help with different tasks. This vacuum gets the job done effortlessly and quickly and I don't have to waste time going over the same area numerous times. It is simple to hold and operate, and lightweight. The price of it is also really affordable and won't break the bank.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong vacuum power, easy to use, multiple attachments, good materials
reviews.reviewText: the vacuum, clean the dirt from my carpet, look at the photo of the dirt and look at the other photo, without the dirt , it turned out nice, very clean, it took out all the dust, it sucked up all the garbage, it worked very well, it has a strong suction power, the container trash bin is spacious, it also moves 360 degrees, from all sides you can enter uncomfortable spaces easier, it comes with extra filters and extra pieces, for more functions and more special cleaning, it works very well in large and small spaces because it can be disassembled to use only the vacuum, it is easy to assemble, the extra pieces help you get everywhere, the manuel's instructions are easy to understand, very easy to read, the material feels quite resistant, quite strong, good materials ,the connection cable is long, I am a talk pero and was comfortable to use ,very convenient when using, I am satisfied, thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good stick vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this NWANA Stick vacuum to try to maintain a clean floor in between cleaning days. I have a nine year old son so there is always dirt, sand, crackers, cookies, etc. on the floor. This handy, lightweight cordless vacuum is perfect to run at the end of the day and pick up whatever mess is left over. The suction is great and it is not heavy. I am teaching my son to clean up after himself by using this handy vacuum. Love this stick vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Marvel of Power and Efficiency - The Ultimate Cleaning Tool!
reviews.reviewText: This stick vacuum from Amazon has completely transformed my cleaning routine. Its robust power and exceptional suction capabilities are truly a marvel. I have used various vacuums over the years, but none compares to the efficiency of this one. It picks up everything from fine pet hair to larger debris with ease, leaving my floors spotless.What sets this vacuum apart is its impressive battery life. I can clean my entire house - multiple floors and various surfaces - on a single charge. This is a huge advantage, especially when dealing with larger homes. The suction power remains consistent throughout the usage, which is a testament to its superior design.The versatility of this vacuum is another aspect that I love. It seamlessly transitions from carpets to hardwood floors without losing suction or efficiency. The various attachments included are perfect for getting into tight spaces and high corners, making sure no spot is missed.Moreover, the ease of maintenance and user-friendly design makes it a joy to use. The vacuum is lightweight, maneuverable, and the dust container is a breeze to empty and clean. It's rare to find a vacuum that combines power, efficiency, and convenience so well.In conclusion, this stick vacuum cleaner is a must-have for anyone serious about keeping their home pristine. Its power, battery life, and cleaning range make it suitable for any household. I highly recommend it - it's a purchase you won't regret.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High-Efficiency Vacuum Cleaner, Making Home Cleaning Effortless
reviews.reviewText: This stick vacuum cleaner from Amazon is one of the best cleaning tools I've ever used. The combination of its power and suction easily meets all my home cleaning needs. Not only does it quickly remove dust and stains from the floor, but its battery life is also impressive, handling continuous cleaning throughout the home with ease.Its cleaning area is equally impressive. Whether it's a spacious living room or a narrow corridor, this vacuum cleaner can easily handle it. Its lightweight design allows me to carry it to any corner of the house, even across different floors of a multi-story building.Besides, I am particularly satisfied with its cleaning results. It not only cleans effectively but is also simple to maintain. The dustbin is easy to wash, and the filter is easy to replace. In short, this vacuum cleaner is an ideal choice for families who seek efficient cleaning, large area usage, and long-lasting durability. I strongly recommend this vacuum cleaner to everyone who values clean and comfortable living.
